bibl.title: The Papyrus Fragments of Sophocles. An edition with prolegomena and commentary. With a contribution by W.S. Barrett.
bibl.seg: Carden Richard, The Papyrus Fragments of Sophocles. An edition with prolegomena and commentary. With a contribution by W.S. Barrett. (Texte und Kommentare. Band 7.)
Berlin - New York, W. de Gruyter, 1974, 8°, xvi-263 pp.

C.R. par Jean Bingen, ChrEg 49 (1974) No. 98, pp. 396-397. - William Calder III, AJP 96 (1975) pp. 409-412. - W. Derouau, EtCl 43 (1975) p. 436. - P. E. Easterling, JHS 96 (1976) pp. 176-177. - J. C. Kamerbeek, BibO 32 (1975) pp. 364-365. - José María Lucas, Emerita 46 (1978) pp. 205-208. - Wolfgang Luppe, Gnomon 49 (1977) pp. 321-330. - G. Ronnet, RPhil 3e s., 50 (1976) pp. 272-274. - Seth L. Schein, CW 70 (1976-1977) pp. 190-191. - Herman Van Looy, AntCl (1975) pp. 245-246. - Z.K. Vysoky, LF 99 (1976) pp. 242-244.
